item.title: 英国央行抽走流动性，银行提高存款利率
item.description: 英国银行向客户提供异常高的利率以吸引现金，这是英国央行缩减资产负债表导致系统流动性萎缩的最新迹象。【原文：UK banks are offering unusually high interest rates to clients in order to attract cash, the latest sign of how the Bank of England’s balance-sheet reduction is shrinking liquidity in the system.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，印度央行选择大幅降息以促进经济增长
item.description: 印度央行周五的货币政策会议纪要显示，印度央行行长表示，在全球不确定的情况下，前置降息和现金刺激将为印度经济提供支持。【原文：India’s central bank governor said that front-loaded interest rate cut and the cash boost would support the Indian economy amid global uncertainties, minutes of the central bank’s monetary policy meeting showed Friday.】

item.title: 电力是渴求电力的美国的新鸡蛋
item.description:
过去一年中，公用事业账单上涨了4.5%，几乎是更广泛的消费者价格指数涨幅的两倍。【原文：

Utility bills jumped 4.5% in the past year, almost double the gains for the broader consumer price index.

】

item.title: HBO 的《Mountainhead》描绘了好莱坞对科技巨头的阴险看法
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Ellen Huet 将探讨 HBO 的电影《Mountainhead》如何展示科技界富豪们不断变化的文化观。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet looks at how HBO’s movie Mountainhead shows the changing cultural view of tech’s rich and powerful.】

item.title: 蓬勃发展的南部城市面临资金削减带来的经济威胁
item.description:
北卡罗来纳州的三角研究中心展示了联邦政府抑制开支的努力如何给美国各地的社区带来经济不确定性。【原文：

North Carolina's Research Triangle shows how federal efforts to curb spending are unleashing economic uncertainty in communities across the US.

】

item.title: 中国甩掉关税，但甩不掉房地产低迷
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注中国的房地产拖累。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at China’s property drag. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 阿里尼-拉扎德基金从 BCI 养老基金获得 2 亿美元投资
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚投资管理公司（British Columbia Investment Management Corp.【原文：British Columbia Investment Management Corp. has made a $200 million anchor investment in a Europe-focused private credit fund launched by Arini Capital Management as part of the firm’s alliance with Lazard Inc.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦计划进口白糖，白糖从四年低点跃升
item.description: 在巴基斯坦启动进口甜味剂计划以抑制国内高价之后，纽约原糖期货从四年低点反弹。【原文：Raw sugar futures rebounded from a four-year low in New York after Pakistan initiated plans to import the sweetener to tame high domestic prices.】

item.title: 付款在即，乌克兰油气公司与投资者会面
item.description: 乌克兰最大的私营石油和天然气公司下周将在伦敦与债券投资者会面，因为该公司今年将面临 7000 多万美元的债务偿还，以及俄罗斯袭击前线附近设施造成供应中断的威胁。【原文：Ukraine’s largest private oil and gas company is meeting with bond investors in London next week as it faces more than $70 million in debt payments this year and the threat of supply disruptions from Russian attacks on its facilities near the front line.】

item.title: 股票牛市讲述 "令人信服的故事"，欧洲反超美国
item.description:
Stoxx600指数受支出和降息提振，策略师认为将进一步上涨 

Strategists see further gains as Stoxx 600 gets a boost from spending, rate cuts 

】

item.title: 尼日尔军政府查封法国核电巨头奥拉诺公司的铀矿
item.description: 尼日尔军政府控制了 Orano SA 的铀矿，使与法国核电公司的对峙升级。【原文：Niger’s military government took control of Orano SA’s uranium mine, escalating a standoff with the French nuclear-power company.】

item.title: 每四个印度人中就有一个只用手机看内容，放弃电视
item.description: 近四分之一的印度人在一项调查中表示，他们只用手机来消费娱乐和媒体内容，而放弃了电视，这对于从 Netflix 公司到 Starlink 公司等在全球最大消费市场寻求增长的公司来说是一个有说服力的信号。【原文：Nearly one in four Indians said in a survey they use only mobile phones to consume entertainment and media content, ditching television, in a telling sign for firms from Netflix Inc. to Starlink Inc. seeking growth in the world’s largest consumer market.】

item.title: Cinven 为 20 亿欧元中型市场基金寻找投资者
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Cinven 正在市场上推出一种新的投资工具，主要针对中型交易。【原文：Private equity firm Cinven is in the market with a new investment vehicle targeting mid-sized transactions, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国监管机构将调查亚马逊拖延向供应商付款一事
item.description: 英国超市监管机构正在调查亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：The UK’s supermarket regulator is investigating Amazon.com Inc. over delayed payments to the online retailer’s suppliers.】

item.title: 德克萨斯石油王朝以 80 亿美元的三菱交易为支付目标
item.description: 阿尔伯特和戈登-赫德尔斯顿在德克萨斯州石油大亨的金字招牌上站稳了脚跟，他们在世界各地钻探石油，积累了大量财富。【原文：Albert and Gordon Huddleston are on the cusp of cementing their place in a gilded lineage of Texas oil tycoons who amassed fortunes drilling across the world.】

item.title: 南非股市有望结束十年外资流出潮
item.description: 动量投资公司（Momentum Investments）认为，随着部分资金从美国流出并流入新兴市场，约翰内斯堡股票的估值折让将缩小，南非股票相对于发展中同行的估值折让也将缩小。【原文：The valuation discount of South African equities relative to developing peers is set to narrow as some of the capital flowing out of the US and into emerging markets finds its way to Johannesburg stocks, according to Momentum Investments.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）称需要更多时间评估尼日利亚的外汇改革
item.description: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）表示，它需要更多时间来评估尼日利亚外汇改革的影响，这表明全球指数提供商尚未准备好恢复这个西非国家的前沿市场地位。【原文：MSCI Inc. said it needs more time to assess the impact of foreign exchange reforms in Nigeria, suggesting the global index provider is not yet ready to restore the West African’s country’s frontier-market status.】

item.title: 中东风险下交易员抵制防御性股票的避风港地位
item.description: 地缘政治紧张局势加剧，美国股市投资者不愿寻求安全，一旦以色列和伊朗之间的冲突在未来几天出现意外转折，投资者就有可能措手不及。【原文：US equities investors are reluctant to seek safety amid flaring geopolitical tensions, raising the risk of getting caught off guard if the conflict between Israel and Iran takes an unexpected turn in the days ahead.】

item.title: 皮涅塔罗的 ION 计划投资由 Azimut 支持的意大利金融科技公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安德烈亚-皮涅塔罗（Andrea Pignataro）的 ION 集团计划收购一家新成立的意大利数字银行的少数股份，该银行由私募股权公司 FSI SGR SpA 和资产管理公司 Azimut Holding SpA 支持。【原文：Andrea Pignataro’s ION Group plans to buy a minority stake in a new Italian digital bank backed by private equity firm FSI SGR SpA and asset manager Azimut Holding SpA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿波罗即将为 EDF 的欣克利项目提供高达 50 亿英镑的资金支持
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司即将与法国电力公司达成协议，为英国欣克利角 C 核电站提供高达 50 亿英镑（67 亿美元）的融资。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is nearing an agreement with Electricite de France SA to provide as much as £5 billion ($6.7 billion) of financing for the Hinkley Point C nuclear power plant in the UK.】

item.title: 特朗普式贸易谈判指南》：他的非正统做法奏效了吗？
item.description:
为了让美国公司更好地进入外国市场，总统正在尝试用武力而不是说服的方式。他承诺的速赢尚未实现。【原文：

The president is trying force rather than persuasion to secure improved access to foreign markets for US companies. The quick wins he promised are yet to materialize.

】

item.title: 日本将超预期削减超长期债券发行量
item.description: 在近几个月超长期债券收益率屡创新高引发市场担忧之后，日本计划今年削减超长期债券的发行量，削减幅度超过早些时候的报道。【原文：Japan is planning to cut the issuance of super-long bonds this year by more than earlier reported, after record highs in super-long yields in recent months stoked market concerns.】

item.title: 王紫晨的美国离职访谈
item.description:
备受欢迎的Substacker回到中国。【原文：

The popular Substacker returns home to China.

】

item.title: 货币交易员在期权押注中放弃美元转投欧元
item.description: 鉴于不可预测的美国政策和全球贸易战所带来的风险，交易员们纷纷绕开美元，欧元在全球货币期权市场上扮演着越来越重要的角色。【原文：The euro is taking on a bigger role in the global currency options market as traders skirt around the dollar given the risks from unpredictable US policy and a global trade war.】

item.title: 奇货可居：王紫晨美国离职访谈（播客）
item.description: 王梓晨是《北京学》通讯的作者，该通讯将中国的重要讲话和文章翻译成英文，并为西方读者介绍其来龙去脉。在过去的一年里，他一直在普林斯顿大学攻读硕士学位，不过最近他已经回国，继续在中国的一家智库工作。由于中美关系日益紧张，对中国留学生的限制也越来越多，他在美国的这段经历显然是在一个非常有趣的时刻发生的。【原文：Zichen Wang is the writer of the Pekingnology newsletter, which translates important speeches and articles from China into English, and contextualizes them for Western readers. Over the past year, he’s been a master’s degree student at Princeton University, although he’s recently returned home to resume his career at a think tank in China. His stint in the US obviously came at a very interesting time, both due to the rising US-China tensions, and also the growing restrictions on Chinese students】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利质疑数字英镑对消费者的影响
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）对为消费者提供数字英镑的必要性表示怀疑，并对英国是否会推进其计划提出质疑。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey cast doubt on the need for a digital pound for consumers, calling into question whether the UK will push ahead with its plans.】

item.title: 印度顶级房地产经纪人的孟买复出项目将于七月推出
item.description: DLF Ltd. 计划下月开始预订孟买的一个高档住宅项目，这标志着这家印度顶级开发商时隔 13 年后重返金融之都，同时寻求新的增长市场。【原文：DLF Ltd. plans to start bookings in a premium residential project in Mumbai next month, marking the return of India’s top developer to the financial capital after thirteen years as it seeks newer growth markets.】

item.title: 港元跌至固定交易区间的弱势末端
item.description: 港元兑美元汇率跌至固定交易区间的弱势末端，因为低廉的融资成本鼓励投资者借入港元并买入美元。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar dropped to the weak end of its fixed trading range against the greenback, as cheap funding costs encouraged investors to borrow it and buy the US currency.】

item.title: 格陵兰颁发国防工业关键金属许可证
item.description: 在国防工业需求不断增长的情况下，格陵兰允许一家加拿大矿业公司勘探钼矿。【原文：Greenland has given permission to a Canadian mining company to explore for molybdenum, a metal critical to the production of steel, amid growing demand from the defense industry.】

item.title: 高盛、花旗认为欧洲经济优势将延续股市涨势
item.description: 华尔街策略师认为，贸易和地缘政治的危险只会减缓欧洲股市的涨势，而不会使其脱轨。【原文：The perils of trade and geopolitics will only slow the rally in European stocks rather than derail it, according to Wall Street strategists.】
